     yea well, how do you see and hear things without touching them, explain that

9.2.17  8:16 pm   update on your next song?

     was really stuck in a rut as usual about how to pick instruments and which direction to go on the song recording, but i had a wild breakthrough with a new randomization technique. most randomization techniques break somewhere around 50% full but this one is working unexpectedly well and it is getting done fast and easy with strong fresh results

     7.5.17 12:49 am

     something of a failsafe comedy mainstay, i'd gather

9.2.17  7:02 pm   Pop Quiz! What's pop?

     it's the sound it makes when a quiz appears suddenly, as if from nowhere

9.2.17  7:01 pm   If you think chords are "bad", why are you passionate about music?

     if i recall i think i said it in response to a question that said "what's a good chord?" which is a question i had a hard time taking seriously, so i said "they are all bad." that's just me having a little fun here on the questions page

9.2.17  6:48 pm   Is your name Louie?

     i will check

9.2.17  6:42 pm   What makes a good song?

     if it's bad

9.2.17  6:42 pm   When were you interested in music?

     during my entire life time

9.2.17  6:25 pm   Is your initial impulse when making something to entertain or have an impact on people beyond entertainment, and how long until you found  balance between these two things that worked for you? Love from alphabet soup xoxofish

     i am trying to balance them right now

9.2.17  6:14 pm   in "no harm", why did you not go with the dotted rhythm at the end?

     which one

9.2.17  6:08 pm   Is the new video tantalizingly close to being done? I can smell it.

     no

9.2.17  6:04 pm   louis ck?

     no, this is bill. i think louis is using a different site

9.2.17  5:53 pm   why does the music video to "barf on me" have no text?

     when i first started making videos on a regular schedule, i recognized that there were 2 completely different ways to make a video. cameras/acting, or just text/graphics on the screen. i designed the content schedule to alternate bwtween these 2 types. it didn't occur to me until about week 3 that i can actually use both in the same video

9.2.17  5:48 pm   Is "super chorus" a term you created, or is it a term that all music people are taught?

     i made it up. it was inspired by popular music of the past few years. it can be found elsewhere too, but i noticed it seems to be very standard in the past 5 years or so. you have the 'chorus' which feels like the chorus, and has a lot of words in it. but then the next section hits even harder and is usually just one word/phrase (usually just the title) repeated in a climactic riff. maybe not even the word, maybe just a climactic riff. and this happens even after the first chorus. it is built into the form. chorus, then super-chorus. it's like more chorus than the chorus

9.2.17  5:20 pm   I got caught looking at the girl I like's window at my dormitory!!! Should I water her plant or invite her at the drive-in??

     maybe you can do both at the same time

9.2.17  5:03 pm   what do you think of the way early civilizations lived their lives?

     earlier than what

9.2.17  3:00 pm   I am writing a book. In my table of contents, should I list what page my table of contents is on?

     that would ruin the fun of searching for it!

9.2.17  12:50 pm   why is the circle of 5ths important? why not the circle of 3rds?

     there are circles of thirds. there's a circle of major 3rds, which is 4 different but identical circles, containing 3 notes each. then there is the circle of minor thirds, which is 3 different identical circles, containing 4 notes each. these are also known as 'diminished' or 'augmented' chords. both usually result in a dizzy or disoriented feeling when used exclusively

9.2.17  12:41 pm   have you ever thought about making tutorials to give us the knowledge

     yes

9.2.17  12:40 pm   whats a good chord

     they are all bad

9.2.17  12:25 pm   How to make a dishwasher clean dishes

     there should be a button that says 'clean the dishes'. press that button

9.2.17  12:23 pm   Did you know that your name backwards is ztruw llib?

     i suspected it but thank you for confirming

9.2.17  11:52 am   Are you (the person that answers these questions) the same person that also makes all the music and videos?

     yes

9.2.17  11:10 am   Opinions/tips for mental health?

     your brain has the wrong balance. please read our pamphlet about what the 'right' balance is, and also buy a subscription to our pills

9.2.17  9:33 am   Is a triad just any 3 note chord, or when people say triad are they just referring to a chord that contains only a root, 3rd, and 5th?

     i think it usually means a major or minor triad. but who knows, maybe it means any 3 notes. you could do an experiment and try calling something else a triad and see what happens

9.2.17  9:25 am   how long has this page been running for?

     about a year and a half

     do you know how many questions you've been asked?

     no

9.1.17  10:41 pm   so... what are you looking for in an assistant? what should they be good at?

     i have no idea. but if someone comes along who is good at something, i would not rule out the possibility of working together, if the opportunity presents itself. most of the time this doesn't happen, because i am very particular about the way i do things and i have learned to do most things myself, but i am not ruling out the possibility that it may work in some way

9.1.17  10:11 pm   Do music videos kill the vibe of the song?

     it depends what vibe you had in mind before you saw the video
